name: NPC Finder
description:
Search GW2 Wiki NPCs (and other objects) and draw an overlay marker on the in-game world map (M).

If you have any questions or feedback/ideas, feel free to reach out (https://github.com/Abattele/NpcFinder/issues) or send an in-game mail at Abattele.8973.

This addon caches the results to your TEMP/NpcFinderCache folder

Made this in my spare time, I won't be able to maintain/improve this too often since I don't really have a lot of time...
